trans-unit.source: Represents a transformation that is a composite of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D" /> children in its <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个转换，它是其 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D" /> 中 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DCollection" /> 子对象的复合形式。

trans-unit.source: This class is useful when grouping transformations that are applied to some objects in a scene but not others.
trans-unit.target: 对适用于在场景而不是其他某些对象的转换进行分组时，此类很有用。

trans-unit.source: It also allows developers to re-use transformations by defining them once and then adding them to different <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup> objects.
trans-unit.target: 它还允许开发人员通过定义它们中重新使用转换一次，然后将它们添加到不同<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup>对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: Collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空集合。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup.Children" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup.Children" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the transformation is affine.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示转换是否是仿射的。

trans-unit.source: True if the transformation is affine; false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果转换是仿射的，则为 true；否则为 false。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> that indicates the current transform value.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" />，它指示当前转换值。

trans-unit.source: Matrix3D that indicates the current transform value.
trans-unit.target: 用来指示当前转换值的 Matrix3D。
